name: DaD Asia
tag_list: incubator, internet-business, china, asia, angel-investor, seed-fund
overview:
DaD Asia is an Internet business incubator located in Shanghai and active in China. As incubator, provides entrepreneurs the resources (Seed capital, know-how, users…) to launch their projects from the very beginning.

The mother company, DaD (www.dad.es), was created in 2004 with a previous experience of more than 10 years on Internet business and has already incubated more than 20 projects in Europe and the States.

DaD Asia is a 2.0 incubator providing advice, mentoring and support besides the seed capital. The DaD Asia ecosystem offers the entrepreneurs the possibility to create partnerships and synergies with other companies or find “smart capital” for the growth of their projects. We do not provide physical space, development or administration services, but we try to reach the best agreements with service providers to add value to the ecosystem.

The headquarters of the company are in Shanghai (China), but there is a close relation with other branches of the mother company in Europe and the States to support the international expansion of the projects.

DaD Asia looks for projects related with China, either targeting the Chinese market or based in China and targeting other markets.
